# DistributedNotificationCenter.CenterType

**Structure**

This constant specifies the notification center type.

## Declaration

```swift
struct CenterType
```

## Type Properties

- **localNotificationCenterType**: Distributes notifications to all tasks on the sender’s computer.

## Initializers

- **init(_:)**
- **init(rawValue:)**

## Constants

- **DistributedNotificationCenter.Options**: These constants specify the behavior of notifications posted using the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/DistributedNotificationCenter/postNotificationName(_:object:userInfo:options:)] method.
- **DistributedNotificationCenter.SuspensionBehavior**: These constants specify the types of notification delivery suspension behaviors.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
